ti:edition.ti:label: Oedipus Tyrannus
ti:edition.ti:description: Sophocles, creator; Sophocles with an English translation Vol 1; Storr, Francis, 1839-1919, editor, translator. London, New York: William Heinemann Ltd., The Macmillan Company, 1912.

ti:translation.ti:label: Oedipus Tyrannus
ti:translation.ti:description: Sophocles, creator; Sophocles the plays and fragments with critical notes, commentary, and translation in English prose Part 1 The Oedipus Tyrannus; Jebb, Richard Claverhouse, Sir, 1841-1905, editor, translator. Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 1887.
